name: BREAKOUT INFINATE
description:
This game was made as part of 'Game a Week 1 - Modernise a Classic' for Uni.

Breakout (Atari 2600) was my inspiration this week, expand on the original game by adding the additional features:

  • Continuously spawning rows of new bricks
  • 3 Power-ups
  • Lives

I've plenty ideas how I could improve and update this game, please help me out by commenting and let me know what you think.

My thoughts are it could be a nice mobile game with a bit of work.
